name: Daksh Engineers
overview:
Establishment in 2005 We, “Daksh Engineers” are specialized in manufacturing a wide range of 100% customized, highly precise and accurate assemblies & components from a wide range of materials ranging from castings, steel, brass to aluminum.

Our Products; Sand Castings Aluminum Castings Ductile Castings Components for Rolling Mills Components for Electronic Industries Precision Machining Components Carbide Components Material Handled

Our Quality Assurance: Coordinate Measuring Machine (CMM) In process and final inspection We offer PPAP Level III submission as per customer requirement Process control as per ISO 9001 2000 quality standards We have been conducting R & R study of our measuring system

Our Team: We work as a team that includes every employee starting from our management team, to our sales and customer service people, to our technical specialists.

Industries We Serve: Rolling Mills Industries Electronics Industries Roofing System (Construction Industry) Automobile Industries Engineering Industries

Why Us?: Diligent workforce Competitive prices Large production capacity Quality approved product line Easy payment modes Optimum client satisfaction
